name: TypeOfTransportationBarrier
title: Type of Transportation Barrier
description: Identification of the type of transportation barrier the person experiences (e.g., long travel distances, lack of vehicle, transportation cost, inadequate infrastructure, and adverse policies affecting travel) (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Type of Transportation Barrier.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an identification of the type of transportation barrier the person experiences (e.g., long travel distances, lack of vehicle, transportation cost, inadequate infrastructure, and adverse policies affecting travel).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Type of Transportation Barrier.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Type of Transportation Barrier.)

contains.display: Current level of confidence I can use public transportation [PROMIS]
